Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Questionable experience. Interior is deffinately great, instagrammable, and the service was amicable, but the food is below average, paid 70 euro, tried almost all tacos (except tuna), nothing worth coming back. Amsterdam and mexican food are still not getting there.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Best thing was the chicken tinga taco. Really fresh corn tortillas. Good nachos (with melted cheese which is nonexistent in Amsterdam). Really small serving of the chips and salsa. Veg fajitas were lacking flavour. Overall really cozy atmosphere.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Absolutely amazing! The nachos are amazing, loaded with cheese and deliciousness until the last bite. The cocktails are also wonderful and I loved the illustrations on the menu. We finished the night with the best churros I've EVER tasted. ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: I would really not recommend this restaurant. We arrived at 8:00 without a reservation and were advised that we could get a table in 10 minutes so we sat at the bar for a first drink. We ordered the starters at the bar which arrived within ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Nice small platters to share. The nachos were not impressive (probably they had forgotten to deliver them, so they were not so warm), but the rest was quite tasty. ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Very disappointing experience. The food was good, but the portions were tiny and way overpriced. The service awful. Despite it being a quiet Wednesday evening, we were ignored for 15 min before receiving a menu. Without telling us, ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: small menu with very standard Mexican food, nothing special or really authentic. Nachos had very little sauce. Flavours were basic. Had to ask for hot sauce. Had high expectations but was quite disappointed. ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Thank you for hosting our first restaurant experience after the COVID-19 pandemic shut down. We really enjoyed everything from the ambiance, to the service, to the food. Everything was done just right! Our waitress was extremely ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text:
Great food, with authentic mexican flavours and a gourmet twist.

However it looks like they're just figuring certain aspects of the restaurant. ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Nice place, good atmosphere, tasty food and decent margaritas. Dishes were not coming in the same time, so we ended up not eating in sync and the waiting time was above my appetite tolerance. But I‚Äôll go again, the place just opened and they do def have potential to make it great.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: New Mexican restaurant opened in the neighbourhood. Very tasty food with authentic Mexican flavours at reasonable prices - all of the tacos were delicious! We tried Frida last night ahead of the official opening at the weekend. Service was ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: The place looks fun. Color scheme is on point, the bar is really interesting, and there is a general feel of a Mexican cantina (though they do go a little overboard with the crucifixes). Music choice is way off. We heard everything from ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: One of the best nights ever! Great food, I love the vegetarian dishes, especially the taco! Good service, very friendly waiter. Tasty dishes and desserts, and... the best cocktails after! Even a little dance after. Great place!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Ordered two cocktails and tortilla chip. And they didn't tell us there's guacamole instead of Salsa verde so we ordered guacamole... Why you write salsa verde in menu if it won't be there?? Chips were just okay. ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text:
Very average food for the price you pay.
Went with a big group and had the feeling that not even all the ordered food was served. ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: We were a group of 15 so we had a closed menu. Since it was the birthday of one of us, we started ordering frozen Margheritas. At 40‚Ç¨/jar the margin on those must be 80%. ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Not authentic at all. Flavors are good but it is not Mexican. Poor selection of drinks including little to no mezcal and tequila options. Any so-called Mexican bar with Heineken on tap is a shame. Decorations are nice, at least...

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Very nice Mexican restaurant with a great vibe and really friendly staff who know what they are doing. We had the Mezcal Chuleton  that is definitely worth the try. The menu also offers a great choice for people who prefer plant based meals. A must try are the Cauliflower Wings!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Very good food and cocktails but inconsistent service. The servers, bartenders and managers are all nice and helpful but there is a breakdown in communication. We were never told about last call for the kitchen, we received double orders of ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text:
I had food poising after my visit onJanuary 2nd and was sick for 24 hours. The portions are small, however the cocktails are good.
They are very stingy on the salsa verde and guacamole. Won‚Äôt be going back!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Yes! Finally another Mexican in Amsterdam :-). The space of Frida Mexican Cantina is great and the restyling touches are well done. In general we were happy with the whole experience: ambiance, drinks and food were of good quality and it's ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: The smallest tacos of my entire life. Nice atmosphere, but food was highly disappointing, not authentic, bad tacos specially the alambre, but we tried others, bad guacamole, tasteless salsas. I ordered a michelada which is not in the menu and was horrible and way overpriced. I would not recommend it. Service was ok though.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Very good food, portions are quite small and normally that would be a con, but here I will count it as a pro because in that way you may try multiple things from the menu. Loved the atmosphere, it was very colorful but not overwhelming.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: What a great addition to the hood! This place just lifts my spirit up! The staff is so welcoming and the food is sooo delicious. Favorites are the Tuna tostada and ceviche. Also loved their cocktails. Will definitely come back here to try the rest of the menu!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: I waited a while to try this new place and I was excited to go since I love a good Mexican meal. However food is disappointing, guacamole tastes like flowers, and the service is just like any other Dutch place. The only good thing is the music!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Long wait for quite spendy, and cold beef tacos. Shame, as I live around the corner, it could've been a regular spot. I was also here for opening night, a lot went wrong and half our order didnt come through. We chalked it up to growing pains. We were wrong.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Though the food was okay, it also needs to be at least 30% cheaper for its quality. Orders where forgotten several times and we received other people‚Äôs orders instead of our own. The vibe is good and the staff friendly (but inexperienced).

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Flavourful and broad meat and vegetarian options and thoughtful decorative touches throughout the restaurant. Perfect place to come as a group and order small plates to mix and match.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Decent food, not awesome not bad. The interior is really nice and give a fun Mexican feeling. There is for sure better Mexicans in Amsterdam, but a good place to go for a fun night.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Nice restaurante where the decoration is very nice and the staff is very nice and helpful. Unfortunatley the food is not that impressive , only 2 types of tacos and very average. ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: great food! very nice that plates are too share, so can have a bit of everything. they also serve classic mexican beers and cocktails.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: The tacos are delicious but the portions are rather small. The main dishes look more like starters. Great food otherwise.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: High quality mexican food for a good price. Amazing drinks and great options if you love mezcal like me. Service is very friendly here!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: some of the best mexican food in amsterdam. the tacos are small in size but packed with flavor and chicken or fish. nachos are great and the food has very good flavor. must gets: elote, chicken tacos, quesadilla, and more elote.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: I liked to come here for drinks, but since this week a new cook and a new menu, and now I love to come here. Great taste, especially the Butterfly Dorado was a treat

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: The food is super yummy and so are the drinks. I've been here twice now and the service is super slow and the waitresses seem uninterested.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Delicious Mexican food and nice atmosphere. Can highly recommend the vegan and smoked chicken taco's :) Will definitely go back!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: The food was bad. The bar is really good and that why the additional 2 stars. It's a very Instagram friendly restaurant.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Food was nice and tasty, but service was slow and many dishes were not available. The decoration of the place also seems very rushed.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: We went there the first week that the restaurant opened and it was super busy still the service was awesome the food was great and the beer top notch great Ambiance as well.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Amazing authentic Mexican food and a wonderful atmosphere. Highly recommend, a great new addition to the neighborhood.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Nice looking local, atmosphere is good food I would say is tasty but nothing extraordinary expected a little bit more.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Had a few drinks at the bar. Cocktails are really good and the barstaff is knowledgable - well done to them!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Small portions, Disneyland atmosphere. Maybe good for tourists. Always seems to be empty.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Love the food and the vibe. It‚Äôs a bit empty due to COVID rules. But still great food.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Very nice food , music and people

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: The level of disrespect for food is stunning üòÇ. Our host was lovely though.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text:
Great new place in our neighbourhood.  The
beef en chicken taco  are delicious.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Not the place to go if you want to eat... Portions are too small and expensive

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Amazing Mexican in the Dam! The food, the service and a great vibe!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Small but tasty tacos and frozen ‚ÄòRita‚Äôs. Vamonos!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Amazing food, friendly staff, and the ambience is stunning!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: It had an OK vibe but didn't seem special enough to make me want to come back.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Nice atmosphere and location, food is mediocre and overpriced though.

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Amazing Mexican food, loved the frozen margaritas!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Atmosphere nice but food not so good

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Great service, atmosphere, drinks and food!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Great service with a stunning interior and delicious food!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Buzzy Mexican Cantina, with outdoor pavement seating

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Really nice new neigberhood spot!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Delicioussssss! See you soon!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Nice Mexican food!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Great cocktails!

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: Got the wrong order

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) What a pleasant surprise! Be surprised in the first instance by the nice interior but mainly by the fantastic food. The tacos, the Chef 'spacials and the great dessert (NOT the churos but the others) In addition, the ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) I am not comparing this place with Mexican restaurants in other countries as all meals are prepared in a simple way in Amsterdam, but overall it is a pleasant place. The staff are very polite. The prices are ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice big place with delicious Mexican food & drinks. Crazy colors with a nice interior where you see that they play with the Mexican theme. Top restaurant to come in early, have an extensive dinner and drink cocktails ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Frida has a beautiful entrance with a nice bar. They have done their best to make the decor festive and they succeeded. But unfortunately the food is not worth a visit. The drink menu gives the impression that this ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) As a vegetarian or vegan really not worth it. The one of the three vegan dishes that we ordered had them and was quite tasty. But super over priced. ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Positive: nice atmosphere on a Friday evening. Fast service. My bag with laptop that I had accidentally forgotten was still there a few hours later. ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Much too expensive. Bad service. Last Friday we often had to wait half an hour to order drinks, then get took another half an hour to make one cocktail. We got things that we had not ordered all the time, other tables ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) An asset to the neighborhood! Good food, top cocktails and cool colorful interior. And plenty of space so that there is always room. The tastiest nachos ever, they make them themselves and are very thin, so that there ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Absolutely a stroke of luck during a city trip. Away from the tourists and yet only 1-2 tram stops further "outside". The menu is small but nice, the food served very quickly. The service courteous and friendly, even ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious surprising cocktails, good food and good service the only drawback was that it was very hot inside. That made it a little less comfortable, but we'll be back for sure. ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) The dishes are too similar in taste. A number of dishes could not be ordered. Would give a chance in a while if the menu is changed. Atmosphere was good, nice staff and the food was served quickly. ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Beautiful business, colorful and also many Mexican relics! Staff is very nice and I think the Chuleton is a must, just like the cocktail menu. The Taco Tuesday is also a bucket list !! ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Reasonable price but without inspiration dishes. Taco from 4.50 Euro is literally a soft shell taco with 4 fries in it plus some hot sauce. Very disappointing ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Overpriced tent with sad portions .. 9 euros for 3 small tacos the size of a pancake ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è nice for your instagram, but after that you better push a hamburger at the snack bar around the corner (tip!) ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) I go to Mexico with my parents every year and we always enjoy the delicious food there. At this restaurant I get the same feeling back! In addition, the food is top notch and the staff is certainly nice. Compliments ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Super cozy place. Much larger than expected. Were placed with 3 people on a place for 2 people near a door where staff had to pass all the time. This was very annoying. Service was poor and took a very long time. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) The service was attentive despite the crowds and the ordered dishes arrived very quickly. The food tastes good, but is a bit on the expensive side. Well worth a visit ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Great food, ok service. Only around 9:15 pm we were already asked if we wanted to place our last order, a bit early. ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious eaten, very fast service while it was still busy. Friendly and attentive staff. Super original food; definitely come back !! ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice staff and very nice, romantic ambiance! Really a nice place for a pleasant drink evening. Food was good too. ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice new place in De Baarsjes. Good food (ceviche / tacos), nice service and a good atmosphere. Recommended! ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) One of the nicest restaurants I have eaten. The employees were also extremely friendly and I really enjoyed it! Thank you very much. üëçüèº ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) nicely decorated, the food is definitely worth coming. And the employees are very sweet, really top service, definitely recommended! ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious eaten. Atmospheric restaurant. Plenty of choices and everything nice and fresh and well prepared. Recommended. ‚Ä¶

Name: Frida - Mexican Cantina
Review Text: (Translated by Google) What a wonderful place this is .. delicious food, nice people and great cocktails. Chapeau! ‚Ä¶
